description: Matcha Highball combines the flavors of matcha and grassy whiskey with club soda, creating a unique flavor that is sure to please. Perfect for any occasion, this refreshing drink will have you coming back for more!
name: Matcha Highball

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the highball glass half with ice cubes and set aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the highball glass half with ice cubes and set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill your cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill your cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the whiskey, matcha powder, lemon juice, and syrup over the ice and shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the whiskey, matcha powder, lemon juice, and syrup over the ice and shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture into the highball glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain the mixture into the highball glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a lemon wheel and serve with a straw.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a lemon wheel and serve with a straw.
